ComicInfo.Summary:
"Trial of Krang," part 3 of 3. The oversized conclusion to the Turtlesâ€™ greatest extra-dimensional story arc is here! Both the prosecution and the defense have tricks up their sleeves as testimony gets emotional. Meanwhile, a war rages outside the courtroom as the Malignoid swarm engulfs Planet Neutrino!
